item.title: Change Curve: Grounding your Authenticity

Change Curve: Grounding your Authenticity

The Change model i've been exploring over the past few months outlines three manifestations of change within an organisation: they can be 'Resistant' to it, 'Constrained' by it, or become 'Dynamic'. item.title: Change Curve: Overcoming the Broadcast model
item.description:
Change Curve: Overcoming the Broadcast model

'Broadcast' is not simply a technology, but rather a mindset: a mindset in which the organisation believes that it owns both the authentic story and the authority over the story. A firm belief in both ownership and the right to own is what makes the organisation Resistant.

item.title: Change Curve: Cognition
item.description:
Change Curve: Cognition

As we work our way through the Change framework, i'm looking at the ways we overcome resistance. I've categorised the Resistors into four spaces: technology, communication, cognition and behaviour. For each, i'm sharing ways we can understand the resistance and the ways we can plant the foundations of change.
